author: Staff Reporter
text:
Water was released from Palar Porundhalar dam for irrigating wet and dry lands under its old and new aycut, jameen ayacut, and old ayacuts of Shanmugar river and Thadakulam at 17 villages here on Wednesday.

Releasing water from the dam, Collector T.N. Hariharan said that 7,592 acres of wet land in old aycut and 9,600 acres of dry land under new aycut would benefit. Inflow to the dam was 13 cusecs and the discharge 43 cusecs.
title: Water released from Palar dam
